Package money.manager.service.activity.implementation

Class ActivityServiceImplementation

java.lang.Object
money.manager.service.activity.implementation.ActivityServiceImplementation
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActivityService
public class ActivityServiceImplementation extends Object implements ActivityService
Uma classe que implementa o serviço relacionado a atividades financeiras.
